Overwatch was one of my favourite games and like modern Activision/Blizzard does they've gutted it. This is a prime example of post 2010 Blizzard basterdization. Sure, aspects of the gameplay are fun and there are even improvements from the original game like the reduction of hard CC. The game is still Overwatch. It's just surrounded by vomit inducing consumer bait. Many aspects of the game seem to exist only to sell shit. I used to be able to grind for skins at a reasonable rate, sure they were RNG but it was something and felt fine even after the $40 price tag. OW 2 on the other hand goes way too far with a Season pass, paying for new heroes, the new shop that prices previously available skins for laughable prices, and the new PvE mode that doesn't do anything other games don't already do better. Hell, from what I've seen come out of Blizzard the last 5 years, I'm sure their planned PvE would have been just as disappointing. The peak of OW 2 though is that they really thought we wouldn't care that they canned the selling point of the "sequel" and stomach all the egregious micro transactions. I'd rather play paladins at least they were up front about being a platform to sell skins for $20.
A game bases totally on lies.
Ever since they removed the ability for a 6 man Winston rush, the games gone down hill.  Just trade Winston to TF2 and it will be a win for everyone, Overwatch can get that bumper car mode in return.
ÑÐºÐ°Ñ‡Ð°Ð» Ñ‚Ð¾Ð»ÑŒÐºÐ¾ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ð¾Ð±Ñ‹ Ð¿Ð¾ÑÑ‚Ð°Ð²Ð¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ð¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ð¸Ñ†Ð°Ñ‚ÐµÐ»ÑŒÐ½Ñ‹Ð¹ Ð¾Ñ‚Ð·Ñ‹Ð²

Installed the game, opened it up just to get all the achievements from BattleNet progress and closed it. Tried to uninstall it and found the game wasn't even closing properly, had to terminate it from Task Manager.

Well done Blizzard. Can't even bring an existing game to another platform without screwing it up.

There's still a decent and enjoyable (although fairly shallow) team shooter here, but it's now buried under so much explicit manipulative monetisation scum at this point that it's hard to recommend bothering anymore. It doesn't help that the vocal community for this game takes it far too seriously, even though the skill ceiling is so fucking low for most characters in the game that it's still hard for me to accept that there was a serious esports scene. Returning to Team Fortress 2 and digging deeper into Deep Rock Galactic pretty much completely replaced Overwatch for me for at least the last three years, and every time I return to Overwatch "2" I quickly wonder why I even bothered. This was "Team Fortress 3" for me at one point, but there's no fucking way I would agree with that statement now.

This game has some of the worst, most egregious, most dogshit monetization of any game i've ever played. Any devs or higher ups who approved this are vile scum. $19 for an outfit change, cutting up the promised PvE and selling it for $15 a pop to milk more money out of players, switching to a battlepass system 80% filled with worthless trash where the free currency can only buy skins from Overwatch 1, and so much more. On top of all that, the game is only fun some of the time! This company can't go bankrupt soon enough.

I've been playing Blizzard's game for more than 10 years, watching the company and product goes worse and worse. If you're a new player and got attracted for some reason, do not download, it will just hurt your heart deeper and deeper over time.
10/10 DO NOT DOWNLOAD

So I have a ridiculous amount of hours between my accounts on the original game and I can say for certain that Overwatch 2 ruined most of what made OW1 so good. Ignoring all the obnoxious stuff with the BP and shop, 5v5 is just not good for the game and the balance changes they've had to make to try to force it to work have made the game utter garbage. It plays like a straight deathmatch now and all the depth of the original is just gone. Sure double shield needed fixing but removing a tank ruined the game. There's a ton of other reasons to not play as outlined by other reviews but at the center of it all there simply isn't a good game here, don't waste your time and definitely don't waste your money on any MTX's.

Neglected Game that only wants your money

fast multiplayer fps with moba elements

pro: +looks nice, much better than it's competitors imo
+fluid and fast gameplay
+heroes play very differently, so people with a lot of different preferences can find sth they enjoy
+feels more polished and less buggy than some of the other multiplayer fps i've played (looking at u apex)

contra: -some heroes are annoying to play against / feel unfair
-there is a lot happening at once, so if you start out you have to learn your way around for some time
-everyone hates it rn so you're not supposed to like it
-as with every competitive multiplayer game the community is the worst thing about it 
-activision-blizzard
-you don't get new characters automatically. to get them instantly after release you need to buy the battle pass (either with real money or with ingame coins that you would have grinded out before); otherwise you need to unlock them through the free version of battle pass, which will take some weeks or you will have to unlock them with challenges later on 

overall: despite blizzards best efforts to change this it is still a fun game. best played with friends
Gameplay is bad, heroes feel unbalanced,... waste of time

The first two years of Overwatch 1 was good, after that it was a stagnant game with nothing more then stun mechanic Heros added.

Overwacth 2 is Overwatch 1 + a money grabber update with no PVE (like promise). Seriously, the reason why the game is still alive is by the porn community.

And this is not without talking about what the company BLIZZARD do and have done inside their walls.
